divy16:8: tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhaptinā dvau śukaśāvakau pratilabdhau |
divy16:9: tena niveśanaṁ nītvā ālāpitau poṣitau saṁvardhitau mānuṣālāpaṁ ca śikṣāpitau |
divy16:10: tayoścāyuṣmānānando ’bhīkṣṇamāgatya caturāryasatyasamprativedhikīṁ dharmadeśanāṁ karoti—yaduta idaṁ duḥkham, ayaṁ duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṁ duḥkhanirodhaḥ, iyaṁ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi |
divy16:12: teṣāṁ kālānukālamupasaṁkrāmatāṁ tābhyāṁ śukaśāvakābhyāṁ nāmāni parijñātāni |
divy16:15: dṛṣṭvā antarjanamāmantrayatah—eṣa bhadantaḥ sthaviraḥ śāriputra āgacchati, āsanamasya prajñāpayateti |
divy16:16: evamāyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ kāśyapaṁ raivatamāyuṣmantamānandaṁ dṛṣṭvā kathayatah—eṣo ’smākamācāryānanda āgacchati, āsanamasya prajñāpayateti |
divy16:18: adrāṣṭāṁ tau śukaśāvakau bhagavantaṁ dūrādevāgacchantaṁ prāsādikaṁ prasādanīyaṁ śāntendriyaṁ śāntamānasaṁ parameṇa cittamatyupaśamena samanvāgataṁ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam |
divy16:19: dṛṣṭvā ca punastvaritatvaritamantarjanamāmantrayatah—eṣa bhadanto bhagavānāgacchati, āsanamasya prajñāpayateti hṛṣṭamadhurasvareṇa nikūjataḥ |
divy16:20: atha bhagavāṁstayoranugrahārthaṁ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy16:21: niṣadya bhagavatā śukaśāvakau caturāryasatyasamprativedhikayā dharmadeśanayā śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau |
divy16:22: atha bhagavāñ śukaśāvakau antarjanaṁ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy16:23: tau cāntarjanasya viharataḥ pramādavihāriṇau biḍālena prāṇinā gṛhītau |
divy16:24: vihvalavadanau cchidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṁdhiṣu namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṁghāyetyuktvā kālagatau cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannau |
divy16:28: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamidamavocat—nāhetupratyayaṁ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy16:29: ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇe? evametadānanda, evametat |
divy16:30: nāhetupratyayaṁ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy16:31: dṛṣṭau tvayā ānanda tau śukaśāvakau? dṛṣṭau bhadanta |
divy16:32: tau ānanda śukaśāvakau mama samanantaraprakrāntasya biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitād vyaparopitau |
divy16:33: tau buddhadharmasaṁghāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālagatau cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannau |
divy16:35: atha saṁbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan |
divy16:36: aśrauṣuḥ saṁbahulā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya pracaranto ’nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane śukaśāvakau—namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṁghāyeti biḍālena prāṇinā vyaparopitau iti |
divy16:37: śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntāḥ pātracīvaraṁ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy16:38: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy16:39: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṁbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantamidamavocan—iha vayaṁ bhadanta saṁbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavad yāvadanāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane dvau śukaśāvakau—namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṁghāyeti kurvāṇau biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitādvyaparopitau iti |
divy16:40: tayorbhadanta kā gatiḥ, kopapattiḥ, ko ’bhisamparāyah? bhagavānāha—tau bhikṣavaḥ śukaśāvakau tasya śaraṇagamanasya vipākena ṣaṭtriṁśatkṛtvaścāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyete, ṣaṭtriṁśatkṛtvastrāyastriṁśeṣu, yāmeṣu, tuṣiteṣu, nirmāṇaratiṣu, paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapastyete |
divy16:41: 124.009 tatastāvat ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu sattvā vyapasaṁsṛtya paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyapratilābhaṁ labdhvā pratyekāṁ bodhimabhisambhotsyete, dharmaśca sudharmaśca pratyekabuddhau bhaviṣyataḥ |
divy16:42: evaṁ hi bhikṣavo mahāphalaṁ dharmaśravaṇaṁ mahānuśaṁsakam, kaḥ punarvādo dharmadeśanā dharmābhisamayo vā |
divy16:43: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava evaṁ śikṣitavyam yanno dharmaśravaṇābhiratā bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
